name: hexsweeper (hitcherland)
description:
a game i made after playing the witness and being very impressed with the teaching mechanisms. gameplay is nothing like the witness.

Weird thing in the top right is the bomb counter, if you want that sort of thing.

Mouse Controls:

left click on a block you think doesn't have a mine

right click on a block you think does have a mine

anyclick the bottom hexagon to restart

Single Button Controls:

click/tap on non-mines

hold click/tap to temporarily change to mines (top left will flash)

- or -

tap top left to change quick tap behaviour

anytap the bottom hexagon to restart
